Posts.Content: RaeFloyd wrote: I am about to begin treatment again for recurrent breast cancer. I had a lupectomy first, then a mastectomy on the same side(left), then a mastectomy on the right, followed by an axellary node removal a year later and now another tumor removed with lymph nodes that all tested positive. I am going to see my oncologist tomorrow to see whats next. All of this has been since 2001. Hopefully it hasn't spread anywhere else. I think I am a cancer magnet. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Just Diagnosed For The 4th. Time RaeFloyd IowaSue45

Posts.Content: Jan 7, 2013 06:12PM RaeFloyd wrote: Saw my doctor today and he is very optimistic. We're doing 4 months of chemo, then radiation with another doctor, then herceptin for the rest of my life or until my heart acts up. If it comes back after this, then I guess I'll just fight some more. I feel pretty good since he seemed upbeat about everything.
Posts.Title: Just Diagnosed For The 4th. Time RaeFloyd IowaSue45
